# [Interview #472: TGS Signing Report - Aubree Pham, Entry #4](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=472#4)

#### Question

Is there any history to the term 'blood and bloody ashes'?

#### Harriet McDougal Rigney

No.
